title: Jack in the Box CEO on Managing the Pandemic
itunes:title: Jack in the Box CEO on Managing the Pandemic
description:
Darin Harris, CEO of Jack in the Box, discusses managing the pandemic and expanding the expanding focus on quick service restaurant business.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
